Articles.Content:
E-Class Destroyer and Refueling Tender!

The new E-Class destroyer is the newest ship to come off the Zokesian Line. She is outfitted with 4 heavy 1.5m all-purpose HE guided missiles which fire upwards and backwards.

E-Class

Parts: 600

Max speed: 45 m/s

Max. turn Speed: 45 m/s

Fuel range (maximum): 350km

Weight: 85 tonnes

Action Groups:

"1" for antennae

"2" for engines

Spacebar to launch missiles off rear; make sure you are throttled up to full.

The Refueling tender is able to grab any other fleet ship with its clamps and then transfer its fuel over to them. It has engines all the way around it to facilitate easy maneuvering up to the target ship.

Action Groups:

"1" for antennae

"2" for forward engines

"3" for right-sideslip

"4" for left-sideslip

"5" for reverse engine

"0" for claws

DOWNLOADS

E-Class: http://www./download/y9tr8kf3rkavyv7/E-Class+Destroyer.craft

Refueler: https://www./?2y3arf91zzt95d6

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited July 13, 2014 by zekes
Very cool. What are those things on the back of the deck? Depth chargers?

Very cool. What are those things on the back of the deck? Depth chargers?

Guided missiles. They have a range of about 10km
Howsit go so fast in water? Is it something to do with the air intakes?

Howsit go so fast in water? Is it something to do with the air intakes?

radial air intakes are very resistant to water, and protect the wings. Having a wide body distrubutes the load and prevents tipping. Tipping causes all the water weight to go on one side of the ship, which most often causes a huge hole.

As someone who pilots boats for a living, I approve heartily of this!

Now I want Jet bow thrusters on my boat!

You must spread some Reputation around before giving it to zekes again.

Damn your talents!
